home.title: Full-Stack Developer
home.body: As a full-stack developer, I'm dedicated to turning ideas into innovative web and mobile applications. Explore my skills in this portfolio and learn a little more about me.

modal.title: About me
modal.body1: My name is Homero Celano, I live in the city of Chacabuco, Buenos Aires province. I've been developing web and mobile applications for about two years and I aspire to continue learning every day.
modal.body2: My main goal is to apply my knowledge as a software developer and my experience working in a team, taking on new challenges to achieve professional and personal growth.

customSectionInfo1.title: Technician in Systems Analysis
customSectionInfo1.subtitle1: Higher Institute of Technical Training No. 132.

customSectionInfo1.title: Pampa Software
customSectionInfo1.subtitle1: Full-Stack Development of Web and Mobile Applications.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body1: Fill out the form to contact me, or access my social media channels using the buttons in the footer.
contact.body2: You can also view or download my CV.
